title: CTRL+ALT+HOME to activate mRemoteNG
author: NN---
body_snippet:
Remote Desktop (mstsc) has shortcut of CTRL+ALT+HOME which activates control bar and lets you to get outside from remote connection.
See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/termserv/terminal-services-shortcut-keys

I would expect mRemoteNG to work the similar way.

iterations.description: The requested feature (global hotkey to activate mRemoteNG) is currently missing and requires implementing global hotkey registration logic.
